Room.Name: Blue Skies
Room.ShortDescription: You are riding a dragon at the south slope of Mount Aphinix. 50.n3.e0.so.w3
Room.LongDescription: The mountain is considered to be the domain of a clan of blood thirsty trolls, and the dragons have been trained to not fly there, lest it anger the trolls and another long war erupts between the people of Brownhaven and the mountain trolls. To the west is the Nartiz Mountain Range, just over some low hills. South of you is the Vallenda Pass, which connects Gotland Glenn with the Vallenda Plains.
